posts.post_content:
Self-mill makes this thing nuts.  
  
"Doom blade."  
"I re-cast it."  
"Go for the throat."  
"I re-cast it."  
"Sever the Bloodline! HA!"  
"I sacrifice the one you're targeting in response. (Altar's Reap, Stitcher's Apprentice, plenty of sac outlets)"  
"Dismember?"  
"Too big."  
"Memoricide!"  
"Hmm, yep, that'll do it. Good thing I've got a couple counterspells for the few cards that can deal with it."
posts.html:
